text: The Chamber of Notaries of Quebec is the regulatory body for the practice of notaries in the province of Quebec and one of two legal regulatory bodies in the province. Founded in 1870 as the Provincial Chamber of Notaries after the merger of three regional notary bodies (Quebec, Trois-Riveries and Montreal), it traces back to the regulation of notaries by the French since 1663. ==References== ==See also== * Bar of Quebec * Bar of Montreal Quebec Category:Notaries Category:Quebec law Category:1870 establishments in Quebec Category:Organizations established in 1870
title: Chamber of Notaries of Quebec
